catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 458
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: rotund figure seated straddling two large rice barrels; carries a large sack over shoulder; black robes; huge earlobes
medium: Ink and light color on paper
signed: Signed and dated upper R edge: [On the first day of the twelfth month of the year 1840, Hokumei]
title: Daikoku Seated on Two Rice Bales
